Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: doll patterns book
A thick book of 93 thin vellum pages bound in heavy parchment. Upon the cover is written in neat script "Patterns for Dolls."
A thick book bound in heavy parchment. Upon the cover is written in neat script "Patterns for Dolls."

the first page of this doll patterns book

Written in the same neat script as the cover of this doll patterns book are the words "Table of Contents" at the top of the first page. Divided into four columns below in tiny print you see this list: "angelica, ape, armadillo, badger, bear, boar, borage, bull, bumblebee, butterfly, carnation, carpenter, cat, cherub, comedy, comhach, courtesan, cow, criminal, crow, daisy, dog, dragonfly, fairy, falcon, ferret, fisherman, fox, goat, gorath, guard, hairdresser, healer, horse, hummingbird, jeweler, kangaroo, kitten, koala, ladybug, laurel, lily, lion, lioness, merchant, mermaid, miner, mink, monkey, mouse, musician, noble, otter, painter, peacock, pigeon, platypus, polar bear, porcupine, priest, puppy, rabbit, raccoon, ram, rat, rhinoceros, rodent, sea serpent, seahorse, seamstress, shark, sheep, skeleton, skink, skunk, sloth, smith, soldier, spider, squire, squirrel, sunflower, thug, tiki, tulip, unicorn, vixen, vulture, weasel, witch doctor, wolf, wolverine, woodcutter."

Written in the same neat script as the cover of this doll patterns book are the words "Table of Contents" at the top of the first page. Divided into four columns below in tiny print you see a list of 93 types of dolls.
